subject: Track and Field
Commonwealth Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: After being injured at the 2012 London Olympics, Goldie Sayers, the British champion, has followed a long road back to a shot at gold in the Commonwealth Games.
snippet: After being injured at the 2012 London Olympics, Goldie Sayers, the British champion, has followed a long road back to a shot at gold in the Commonwealth Games.
